chapters.title: Chapter 16: Unexpected Absences
chapters.info: Malind Nachenin, p. 331 (371)—Plump Sitter for the Green Ajah among the rebel Aes Sedai. She has a pretty face with full lips and dark, fierce eyes. She was raised after the sisters banded together in Salidar. She once proposed an “appeal” (i.e. demand) to area nobles for assistance in building their army.
